name: fiery-dance
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.
